data.author: Diego Molla

changelog.release_notes: Fixed bug and added colours for Pebble Time
Fixed some bugs that made the app crash unexpectedly.
This version adds calibration information to the compass. To calibrate the compass, move the arm until the "calibrating" text disappears.

This version incorporates compass heading. To record a log of the compass heading, click the middle "select" button. To record a log of the air reading, use the up and down buttons to change the reading, and it will be recorded 3 seconds after the latest modification. The combined air and compass heading logs are visible in the log screen after a long click on the middle "select" button. To reset all data, double-click on the "select" button.
The fonts for the air pressure and time are now larger, and the vibration stops when in the log window.
Added vibration. Every five minutes it will vibrate until a new log is entered.
Persistent storage capabilities added. Now the log data will only be erased when re-setting the timer by double-clicking on the select button. The timer will not run when the app is not running.
First release. This release displays the logged data but it will not keep it if the app exits.

data.description: A companion to scuba divers. This app can help you time your dives, and record your air consumption and compass heading. Simply press the up and down buttons to change the air pressure, and it will be recorded and time-stamped. To record the compass heading, press the middle button. You can see a log if you long-press on the select button. To reset the timer and clear the log, double-press the select button. Every five minutes it will vibrate to remind you to log the air pressure.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed bug and added colours for Pebble Time

data.title: Scubawatch
